# Pies - All pies require a pie tin along with the other ingredients in the microwave! The tin is retrieved when the pie is eaten, but when the pie is thrown, the tin is lost.
[color=#a4885c]Apple Pie[/color]
- pie dough - 3x apple
[color=#a4885c]Meat Pie[/color]

[color=#a4885c]Xeno Pie[/color]
- pie dough - 3x xeno meat
[color=#a4885c]Banana Cream Pie[/color]
- pie dough - 3x banana
[color=#a4885c]Amanita Pie[/color]
- pie dough - 1 Fly Amanita
